name: Bloop's Adventure
description:
Bloop's Adventure is a 2D platformer where you can complete quests, collect items, and avoid enemies to reach the goal. All art and music is from the Unity Asset store and FreeSound.Org. Coded and Designed by Adam Yassine. 

Story: After doing a few thing around the house for Bloop's mother, Bloop doesn't listen and does something that one shouldn't do. And that sets Bloop on an adventure to collect coins, avoid enemies, and find their way home.
